root.name: HAL's Hole In One Golf
root.description: OverviewHAL's Hole in One Golf (a.k.a. "Jumbo Ozaki no Hole in One") is a sequel to the 1988 FDS game Jumbo Ozaki no Hole in One Professional, as well as a continuation of earlier Jumbo Ozaki endorsed HAL golf games on the MSX. It is a graphically updated version of the top-down golf sim

similar_games.game: True Golf Classics: Pebble Beach Golf Links
True Golf Classics: Waialae Country Club
St Andrews: Eikou to Rekishi no Old Course
